original_title: 西野カナ - LOVE it Tour 〜10th Anniversary〜
overview: The final performance from the 10th anniversary arena tour filmed!  This year, Kana Nishino celebrated the 10th anniversary of her debut with a nationwide hall tour and a nationwide arena tour, the largest of her career, which drew approximately 200,000 people. This film is a visualization of the performances at Yokohama Arena in Kanagawa Prefecture on October 9 (Tue.) and 10 (Wed.) from the arena tour "LOVE it Tour ~10th Anniversary~." The video includes the latest hit songs such as "Bedtime Story" and "Pa," popular songs such as "Torisetsu" and "Darling," early songs such as "if" and "Namida Iro," cool dance medley unique to LIVE, "Have a Nice Day" on the trolley. It's full of gorgeous performances, including a dance performance incorporating the "LED" Handi-Vision system. The 11 gorgeous costumes are also a must-see.
title: Kana Nishino - LOVE it Tour 〜10th Anniversary〜
